thread.title: Freezing hotel rooms
thread.title_full: Freezing hotel rooms - Review of Premier Inn London Stratford Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Russell C
title: Freezing hotel rooms
text:
Good location but hotel looking rather worn in places. Major problems with heating in room (see below) which made for a very uncomfortable night.
Heating did not work in bedroom - even when turned up to the hottest setting was blowing cold air out. I had to sleep in the termals and socks which I had on at the football that evening. Not what you expect to need to do after spending Â£80 plus on a room.
